timeline.message:
Compare .max() and .current() when calculating use

* .max() only has a value when the user specified auto-scaling.
  Thus we need to compare .max() with .current() to make sure we
  get the correct values when calculating quota usage.

* Moved quota usage calculations into DeploymentQuotaCalculator.

* Added author and copyright notice.

timeline.bodyText: Consider adding a unit test for these scenarios.
